page.title: 17COUNTRY PUBLIC HOUSES.
page.content: There are many interesting country pubs in the area some of these are the Woodbine, the Volunteer and the Good Intent.The Volunteer pub does pub food like ploughmans lunches these range from 50p-5 pounds.Also they specialise in chinese food and they also do steaks.There are 10 people working here. The Woodbine has been open since 1888.It also does pub food.4 people work there in the week.They are open everyday.10.30-14.30 and 18.00-22.30 Fri-Sat until 23.00.The Good Intent has a new land lady who has only been resident there for 6 weeks.It is 200- 300 years old.All have picturesque beer gardens overlooking forest and attract many visitors.The Wakearms pub is derelict awaiting planning permission. It is said to be haunted by a rock group.It was a regular venue on the London rock group circuit.
